subject: Add multiple command support
description: Extend skill/scripts/main.py to support multiple commands like --list, --clear, --backup
activeForm: Add click commands and argument groups

subject: Add incremental update support
description: Implement incremental fetching that only adds new articles since last run
activeForm: Add time-based filtering to only fetch articles newer than last run

subject: Add archiving support
description: Move old articles to archive files with configurable retention period
activeForm: Add archive command and retention period configuration

subject: Add export format support
description: Support multiple export formats (CSV, RSS feed generation)
activeForm: Add export command with format option
